holidays.title: Azerbaijan Armed Forces Day
holidays.description: Let us join in the festivities to celebrate Azerbaijan Armed Forces Day.

holidays.title: Flag Day of Romania
holidays.description: Flags inspire national pride, they symbolize important values, and convey meaningful messages.

holidays.title: Forgiveness Day
holidays.description: Practicing forgiveness is a great way to wipe the slate clean and clear your conscience.

holidays.title: International Day Against Drug Abuse and Illicit Trafficking
holidays.description:
International Day Against Drug Abuse and Illicit Trafficking stops people from using drugs and
saves lives.

holidays.title: Madagascar Independence Day
holidays.description: Get ready to Trompa (Madagascar folk dance) as we celebrate this day with gusto!

holidays.title: National Barcode Day
holidays.description: Let us prepare to celebrate the U.P.C. —  the code that simplifies our shopping.

holidays.title: National Beautician Day
holidays.description: Beautify your beautician day by taking your hat off for them for their great work!

holidays.title: National Bomb Pop Day
holidays.description: Summer is here in full force so, to help combat the heat, we present this treat.

holidays.title: National Canoe Day
holidays.description: Gear up with a paddle and life jacket, it’s time to celebrate National Canoe Day.

holidays.title: National Chocolate Pudding Day
holidays.description: If you had chocolate pudding in your lunch sack, you knew you had top currency.

holidays.title: National Handshake Day
holidays.description: Join us as we take a closer look at the handshake, unwrapping the different meanings behind it.

holidays.title: National Report Trade Agreement Act Fraud Day
holidays.description: Join us to fight the good fight against all fraudulent activities in America today.

holidays.title: Somalia Independence Day
holidays.description: On this day, we celebrate independence, which is the birthright of every nation.

holidays.title: United Nations International Day in Support of Victims of Torture
holidays.description: Torture is a crime under international law. Join us as we stand against it.

holidays.title: Watermelon Seed Spitting Week
holidays.description: Hone your seed-spitting skills with us at this annual watermelon seed spitting event.

holidays.title: World Refrigeration Day
holidays.description: Let’s remember World Refrigeration Day’s history and celebrate it in the best way possible.

holidays.title: Andrew Davila’s Birthday
holidays.description: Where did it all start for the O.G. social media star, Andrew Davila?

holidays.title: Angelina Pivarnick’s Birthday
holidays.description: It’s time to dive into the world of Angelina Pivarnick in celebration of her birthday!

holidays.title: Ariana Grande’s Birthday
holidays.description: She has the beauty and the voice, and her ambition has taken her to the top.

holidays.title: Aubrey Plaza’s Birthday
holidays.description: Plaza began her improv career in 2004 with the Upright Citizens Brigade. Now she’s a hit.

holidays.title: Chiquis’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate this inspiring multi-talented woman who has succeeded in singing, writing, and acting!

holidays.title: Derek Jeter’s Birthday
holidays.description: Derek Jeter has established himself as one of baseball's most admired and iconic figures.

holidays.title: Jacob Elordi’s Birthday
holidays.description: Who is the heartthrob behind all these major roles in movies and series?

holidays.title: Jennette McCurdy’s Birthday
holidays.description: From being an actress to a producer, McCurdy has no shortage of talent.

holidays.title: Jessica Batten’s Birthday
holidays.description: Jessica Batten has no regrets about following her heart and urges others to do the same.

holidays.title: King Bach’s Birthday
holidays.description: Social media personality, comedian, actor, and producer — is there anything he cannot do?

holidays.title: Mikey Williams’s Birthday
holidays.description: An overview of where Mikey Williams started basketball, where he is now, and everything in between.
